QuestData.Title: Pay It Forward
QuestData.Description: You are now able to move about this realm more freely and without fear of drowning.$b$bThis is where our work begins.$b$bFirst, you have many allies nearby who are drowning as we speak. As I saved you, you must save them.$b$bI have enchanted the shell you brought me. Use it to rescue your friends.$b$bHurry now!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Enchanted Conch to rescue 6 Drowning Warriors.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to rescue the warriors, $r?$b$bWe will perish without their help...
QuestData.RewardText: While you were away, I was able to revive some of the fallen warriors.$b$bWe'll need every hand if we are to survive here.
